import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, FormGroup, Input,Button, Container } from 'reactstrap'; const ClientEdit = () => { const emptyItems={ name:'', email:'' } const[items,setItems]=useState(emptyItems); return (
setItems(e.target.value)}/> setItems(e.target.value)} />
) } export default ClientEdit
